title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4059.1 - Blinkers must be approved
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4059.1 - Blinkers must be approved

State Regulations

No horse shall be allowed to start in a steeplechase or
hurdle race with blinkers unless such blinkers are of a pattern approved by the
stewards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4059.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
